programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> -n </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
;browse for text files in current directory instr 1 iCnt init 0 SFilenames[] directory ".", ".txt" iNumberOfFiles lenarray SFilenames
until iCnt>=iNumberOfFiles do printf_i "Filename = %s \n", 1, SFilenames[iCnt] iCnt = iCnt+1 od endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> i1 0 1 </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
